title: Polar Function - Describing Behaviors - Part A

content.question: Part A On the closed interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>1.5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D96@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, determine the coordinates of the absolute minimum value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>g</mi> </math> and the absolute maximum value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>g</mi> </math>. Label your answers appropriately.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
